topic.title: Cannot publish my blog site
topic.body:
No peers found. 

[飘在英国](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1EFWdhL9Q6ikvoUAj18Z9kqHvSvFR4CD84)

Issue had been solved.

topic.title: 哪个零网站点人气比较旺？

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body:
> [sirzechs](#comment_2_1KZCoVfrjE2zbgBdTrzowgebHrLEgc9gPB): دوستان عزیز فارسی زبان لطفا تو فوروم انگلیسی به فارسی تاپیک نسازیدفوروم فارسی از طریق این آدرس:http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PyJqA1V8wFemvEJ2FeJ8CmVnEtR2nngNpیالینک فارسی بالای همین صفحه در دسترس هست

Received

1563304496_163cCAVJzhzn2hYne8LtFjyAfDbRQ.body:
> [chk141@kxoid.bit](#comment_28_1BpHWvNs687CgyxG3B5aJQARenUfnekTDD): BMZVOW2UASZNNO4DXE2CHTF3WN5ZURPO5资源大全持续更新中,开放读写,欢迎补充(Sync)

访问不了，没有peer，你开放15441端口了么？
作为开放网络，没权管别人说什么，但是有权选择自己说什么看什么，看不惯就拉黑他们吧

1576748335_1LHvuxYZmnEjfamgn2jq7cRnp6MpQ.body: I got it. Need to open 15441 port

> [styromaniac](#comment_1457_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Or go here to get Tor peers, then sign and publish: [...]

Many thanks

> [randomshits](#comment_318_1CuFETj5LtyEduzaoAcdv9sMAQtYRqjqDY): It would be nice if people would provide a short description of what their site is before asking people to seed it.

just a personal blog about life in UK (in Chinese). I've submitted to the tracker with styromaniac's help. now it got several peers.

1576768836_1Tr8KpfPw9HXit4dC5U6Eiu3nV5pd.body: Still work today and next Monday. :(

1518061664_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nw.body:
> [originwang](#comment_3_1MDXPHaN8SwQeeUpDYc1bcHASTRCJiqSEX): 郭文贵就是前期中国中层民主发展到最后，九龙治水出现的对底层杀鸡取卵的恶性腐败蔓延滋生出的一个现象。国家整治腐败是必然的，其中被牵涉利益的人当然会为了自身利益辩护。甚至不惜投敌。中层是最容易叛国的。想叛国而且能叛国。

只有到国外才敢讲话（真假待定，但无风不起浪）
